content: this 12 afghan square uses puff stitches and back post stitches to create an array of fan shapes bright contrasting colors make the fans appear to move and dance around each other or try a single color to bring out the rich texture created by the post stitches fan dance now also comes in a 9 inch square click here to go directly to the instructions for the 9 inch variant 1 1 http //everytrickonthehook com/2016/02/16/fanning-the-flame/
